summary: Live from New York City, Jerry Seinfeld, aided and abetted by a host of friends and fellow comedians, performs his 1998 Emmy-nominated performance on Broadway.
cast: Jerry Seinfeld|Michael Barryte|Grace Bustos|George Carlin|Alan King|Robert Klein|Carol Leifer|Jay Leno|Ed McMahon|Larry Miller|Paul Reiser|Garry Shandling|George Wallace
keywords: stand up comedian|live audience|one man show|stand up|stand up special
title: Jerry Seinfeld: 'I'm Telling You for the Last Time'
